content: the marshmallow crochet baby blanket is a nice fluffy baby blanket with lots of texture you can make this with any yarn or hook size samples shown in photo the striped marshmallow crochet baby blanket and the blanket behind is a single color for a solid look either are a beautiful marshmallowy choice update 12/16/15 matching hat pattern available now with cal http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/marshmallow-crochet-baby-hat 1 crochet along video tutorial http //youtu be/yopxjsiy478 2 recently added video tutorial on youtube this link isn t in the pattern please bookmark for reference https //www youtube com/watch v=rbyxs-nfdxq 3 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/marshmallow-crochet-baby-hat 2 http //youtu be/yopxjsiy478 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=rbyxs-nfdxq
